game.name: CannonBubs
game.desc:
Description: Shoot down enemy planes. Your projectiles are *hard* and *fast* - just not at the same time.
Cannonballs are slow but can destroy planes. Bubbles are fast and don't do damage, but they can move cannonballs off course.
Controls: * Arrow Keys - move your plane * Z - shoot bubble * X - shoot cannonball
